General.Name: Wushang Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Wushang Group Co., Ltd. engages in the commercial retail business in Hubei province, China. The company operates shopping malls and supermarket chains. It is also involved in the real estate development and property management; asset management; import and export trading; ice and snow culture management; exhibition design and production; wholesale of commodities; and shopping mall management activities, as well as provides planning services. The company was formerly known as Wuhan Department Store Group Co., Ltd. Wushang Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Wuhan, China.
